Posts.EditableText: I have been working for a while now on a game, written in Quest, called "Dance Quest." The gameplay style has similarities to games such as Enchanter, Whitefield Academy of Witchcraft, and Augmented Fourth. I have tested the game to the best of my ability on my own, and was hoping if there were a few people who might help me turn up anything that I may have overlooked. If you are interested in giving me some constructive criticism about the game mechanics, please leave a brief post about why this appeals to you and I will send you a message with a link to the game. I will post a new thread in this forum when the game is officially released.
